title: David Hurley - Wikipedia
snippet: 2025–: Chancellor of the Australian University of Theology · Hurley is an Honorary Patron of the ACT Veterans Rugby Club, Patron of Transport Heritage NSW, Patron of the Australian World Orchestra, and the Australian Future Leaders Foundation. As of 2020 he is one of three patrons of the ...

title: NSW Governor David Hurley will be Australia’s new Governor-General
snippet: Scott Morrison has announced that New South Wales Governor David Hurley will become Australia’s next Governor-General, succeeding Sir Peter Cosgrove.

title: Former general David Hurley chosen as Australia's next Governor-General
snippet: The current Governor-General, Sir Peter Cosgrove, is due to complete his five-year tenure in March. But Mr Hurley is governor of NSW, which will hold an election in March, two months before the expected national poll.

title: David Hurley facts for kids
snippet: David Hurley at his swearing-in ceremony as the 27th Governor-General of Australia. On 16 December 2018, Prime Minister Scott Morrison announced that David Hurley would be the next Governor-General of Australia.
